entry.div:
For making
bronze
in the color of steel
Take
glass alum
&
antimony
, but one needs
twice as much
glass alum
as
antimony
, and pestle the whole together in an
iron
mortar
, & then mix with
gum water
while grinding it on
marble
, & then one needs to use it with a
paintbrush
, & next let it dry, and then polish it with a
tooth of a
wolf
or
dog
.
